Have you ever found yourself lost in an endless scrolling loop of Youtube Shorts, wasting hours of your precious time? If so, don't worry, you're not alone. With the rise of short-form video content, it's easy to get caught up in the addictive world of Youtube Shorts.

But fear not, there's a solution! This handy plugin has been designed to remove Youtube Shorts from your Home and Subscriptions pages, so you can focus on the videos that matter most to you. Say goodbye to mindless scrolling and hello to a more productive Youtube experience.

With this plugin, you'll have more control over your viewing habits and can easily avoid the distractions of short-form content. Whether you're looking to be more productive, reduce screen time, or simply regain control of your Youtube browsing, this plugin is the perfect solution. Try it out today and see the difference for yourself!
